data.title: A Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
data.description: Use this Sky Smoke + Incendiary setup to delay people from pushing through the A Main chokepoint into A Site.

data.title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
